title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Pesticide
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Pesticide 

Residues) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (pesticide residues) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities (Pesticide Residues) Regulations 2008 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Pesticide Residues) Regulations 2008 (S.I. 
No. 565 of 2008) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the 
definition of “Pesticide MRL Regulation”, (as amended by the European 
Communities (Pesticide Residues) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. 
No.617of 2019)), the following– 

“‘Pesticide MRL Regulation’ means Regulation (EC) No 396/2005 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 23 February 200510 as amended by 
Commission Regulation (EC) No 149/2008 of 29 January 200811, Regulation 
(EC) No 299/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 
200812, Commission Regulation (EC) No 260/2008 of 18 March 200813, 
Commission Regulation (EC) No 839/2008 of 31 July 200814, Commission 
Regulation (EC) No 256/2009 of 23 March 200915, Commission Regulation 
(EC) No 822/2009 of 27 August 200916, Commission Regulation (EC) No

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: 3. The European Communities
text_raw:
3. The European Communities 

(Pesticide Residues) 

(Amendment) 

Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 617 of 2019) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 November, 2020. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [558] 9
text_norm: 3 european community (pesticide residues) (amendment) regulation 2019 (s.i no 617 2019) revoked given official seal 25 november 2020 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine 558 9

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving full effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the maximum residue levels (MRL) for certain plant 
protection products permissible in food and feed as provided for under 
Regulation (EC) No 396/2005. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 10 [558] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
52 FAICHE STIABHNA, BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 2, 
D02 DR67.
